title: Episode 208: Marriage Stories with Heather Havrilesky
itunes:title: Episode 208: Marriage Stories with Heather Havrilesky
description:
Doree becomes a new version of herself with bangs and Kate connects with the moon in a way she’s never done before. Then, author Heather Havrilesky joins Forever35 to talk about the New York Times review that didn’t understand her latest book Foreveland, why glamour photoshoots should be a thing again, and why she’s dubious about (but still uses) neck creams.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter.
